|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/03/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Valid replacement for Samsung WIS09ABGN adapters (confirmed at least in 2010 C-models).
Take care, as there's a new V3 version that is not compatible with Samsung TVs!
